English_PDA_old: Now I only need to find the [c][fbff00]Bridge Logs[-][/c].\n\nI better check my weapons. This is much too silent for so many lost souls...
English: Now I only need to find the [c][fbff00]Bridge Logs[-][/c].\n\nI better check my weapons. This place is much too silent for so many lost souls yet no bodies...
Japanese_PDA_old: 今はただ [c][fbff00]Bridge Logs[-][/c] を見つけるだけだ。\n\n武器をチェックしたほうがいい。この場所は失われた魂がこんなにも多いのに、遺体が全くないほどとても静かだ...

English_PDA_old: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Commander, I am tracking increasing activities in the ship.\n\nBe careful.
English: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Commander, I am tracking increasing activity in the ship.\n\nBe careful.
Japanese_PDA_old: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] 司令官、船内で活動が増加していることを追跡しています。\n\n気をつけてください。

English_PDA_old: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Attention. Hostile creatures detected moving to our position!
English: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Attention. Hostile creatures detected moving on our position!
Japanese_PDA_old: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] 注意。敵対的な生物が我々の位置に向かって移動中です！

English_PDA_old: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] The doors are locked due to an ventilation problem.\n\nFind the [c][fbff00]ventilation control [-][/c]and resolve the issues.
English: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] The doors are locked due to a ventilation problem.\n\nFind the [c][fbff00]ventilation control [-][/c]and resolve the issue.
Japanese_PDA_old: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] 換気問題のため、ドアがロックされています。\n\n[c][fbff00]換気制御[-][/c]を見つけて、問題を解決してください。

English_PDA_old: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Follow the corridors. They are a bit of a labyrinth. Expect bad surprises.\n\nI have set a [c][fbff00]maker on your screen[-][/c] to assist you with the pathfinding.
English: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] Follow the corridors. They are a bit of a labyrinth. Expect surprises.\n\nI have set a [c][fbff00]maker on your screen[-][/c] to assist you with the pathfinding.
Japanese_PDA_old: [c][00ffff][IDA][-][/c] 廊下を進んでください。 それらはやや迷路のようです。 驚きがあるでしょう。\n\n経路探索を支援するために、[c][fbff00]画面上のマーカー[-][/c]を設定しました。

English_PDA_old: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]The [c][ffffff]lever[-][/c] for activating the Freight Elevator is in the cargo bay ahead of us.   \n\nWhen inside, look [c][ffffff]to the right[-][/c] at the [c][ffffff]wall below the windows[-][/c].
English: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]The [c][ffffff]lever[-][/c] for activating the Freight Elevator is in the cargo bay ahead of us.\n\nWhen inside, look [c][ffffff]to the right[-][/c] at the [c][ffffff]wall below the windows[-][/c].
Japanese_PDA_old: [c][00ffff][IDA] [-][/c]貨物エレベーターを作動させるための[c][ffffff]レバー[-][/c]は、私たちの前方にある貨物ベイにあります。\n\n内部に入ったら、[c][ffffff]右側に[-][/c]ある[c][ffffff]窓下の壁[-][/c]を見てください。

English_PDA_old: The Prisoner is held captive in a container at the back of the wreckage
English: The hostages are held captive in a container at the back of the wreckage
Japanese_PDA_old: 人質は残骸の後部にあるコンテナに拘束されています
